FAM HHLDER", "UNMARRIED CIV . Variable: hrintsta 
Type: integer

Values: "INTERVIEW", "TYPE A NON - INTERVIEW", "TYPE B NON - INTERVIEW", "TYPE C NON - INTERVIEW"

Variable: hrnumhou 
Type: integer
Description: Total number of persons living in the household (household members)

Variable: hefaminc 
Type: integer
Description: Family income (combined income of all family members during the last 12 months. Includes money from jobs, net income from business, farm or rent, pensions, dividends, interest, social security payments and any other money income received by family members who are 15 years of age or older.) Note: Caution should be used when using this variable since it has an allocation rate of approximately 20 percent.
Values: "LESS THAN  $ 5 , 000", "5 , 000 TO 7 , 499", "7 , 500 TO 9 , 999", "10 , 000 TO 12 , 499", "12 , 500 TO 14 , 999", "15 , 000 TO 19 , 999", "20 , 000 TO 24 , 999", "25 , 000 TO 29 , 999", "30 , 000 TO 34 , 999", "35 , 000 TO 39 , 999", "40 , 000 TO 49 , 999", "50 , 000 TO 59 , 999", "60 , 000 TO 74 , 999", "75 , 000 TO 99 , 999", "100 , 000 TO 149 , 999", "150 , 000 OR MORE"

Variable: hxfaminc 
Type: integer
Description: Allocation flag

Variable: hwhhwgt 
Type: integer
Description: Household weight (4 implied decimal places) used for tallying household characteristics

Variable: hwhhwtln 
Type: integer
Description: Line number (PULINENO) of the person whose PWSSWGT was donated as HWHHWGT for the household.
Values: "MAX VALUE FILLER 1 78  -  78"

Variable: pulineno 
Type: integer
Description: Person's line number.
Values: "MAX VALUE FILLER 2 149  -  150"

Variable: puchinhh 
Type: integer
Description: Change in household composition.
Values: "PERSON ADDED", "PERSON ADDED  -  URE", "PERSON UNDELETED", "PERSON DIED", "DELETED FOR REASON OTHER THAN DEATH", "PERSON JOINED ARMED FORCES", "PERSON NO LONGER IN AF", "CHANGE IN DEMOGRAPHIC INFORMATION FILLER 2 145  -  146"

Variable: puwk 
Type: integer
Description: Last week, did you do any work for (either) pay (or profit)?
Values: "YES", "NO", "RETIRED", "DISABLED", "UNABLE TO WORK"

Variable: pubus1 
Type: integer
Description: Last week, did you do any unpaid work in the family business or farm?
Values: "YES", "NO"

Variable: pudis 
Type: integer
Description: Disability status (last month you were reported to have a disability.) Does your disability continue to prevent you from doing any kind of work for the next 6 months?
Values: "YES", "NO", "DID NOT HAVE DISABILITY LAST MONTH"

Variable: pulay 
Type: integer
Description: Last week, were you on layoff from a job?
Values: "YES", "NO", "RETIRED", "DISABLED", "UNABLE TO WORK"

Variable: puhroff1 
Type: integer
Description: Last week, did you lose or take off any hours from your job, for any reason such as illness, slack work, vacation, or holiday?
Values: "YES", "NO"

Variable: puhroff2 
Type: integer
Description: How many hours did you take off?

Variable: puhrot1 
Type: integer
Description: Last week, did you work any overtime or extra hours (at your main job) that you do not usually work?
Values: "YES", "NO"

Variable: puhrot2 
Type: integer
Description: How many additional hours did you work?

Variable: puabsot 
Type: integer
Description: Last week did you have a job either full or part-time?
Values: "YES", "NO", "RETIRED", "DISABLED", "UNABLE TO WORK"

Variable: pubusck1 
Type: integer
Description: Check Item 1 filter for questions on unpaid work
Values: "GOTO PUBUS1", "GOTO PURETCK1"

Variable: pubusck2 
Type: integer
Description: Check Item 2 skips owners of family businesses who did not work last week
Values: "GOTO PUHRUSL1", "GOTO PUBUS2"

Variable: pubusck3 
Type: integer
Description: Check Item 3
Values: "GOTO PUABSRSN", "GOTO PULAY"

Variable: pubusck4 
Type: integer
Description: Check Item 4
Values: "GOTO PUHRUSL1", "GOTO PUABSPD"

Variable: puretot 
Type: integer
Description: Retirement status (last month you were reported to be retired, are you still retired this month?)
Values: "YES", "NO", "WAS NOT RETIRED LAST MONTH"

Variable: puhrck1 
Type: integer
Description: Check item 1 (HRACTT)
Values: "GOTO PUHRUSL2", "GOTO PUHRUSLT"

Variable: puhrck2 
Type: integer
Description: Check Item 2 skips persons responding yes to HRFTPT out of PT series.
Values: "IF ENTRY OF 1 IN MJ AND ENTRY OF D ,  R OR V IN HRUSL1 AND ENTRY OF D ,  R ,  V OR 0 - 34 IN HRUSL2 GOTO HRFTPT", "IF ENTRY OF 1 IN MJ AND ENTRY OF D ,  R OR V IN HRUSL2 AND ENTRY OF D ,  R V OR 0 - 34 IN HRUSL1 GOTO HRFTPT", "IF ENTRY OF 2 ,  D OR R IN MJ AND ENTRY OF D ,  R OR V IN HRUSL1 GOTO HRFTPT", "IF ENTRY OF 1 IN BUS1 AND ENTRY OF D ,  R OR V IN HRUSL1 THEN GOTO HRFTPT", "ALL OTHERS GOTO HRCK3 - C"

Variable: puhrck3 
Type: integer
Description: Check Item 3.
Values: "IF ENTRY OF 1 IN ABSOT OR  ( ENTRY OR 2 IN ABSOT AND ENTRY OF 1 IN BUS AND CURRENT R_P EQUALS BUSLST )  THEN GOTO HRCK8", "IF ENTRY OF 3 IN RET1 GOTO HRCK8", "IF ENTRY IN HRUSLT IS 0 - 34 HOURS GOTO HRCK4 - C", "IF ENTRY IN HRUSLT IS 35 +  GOTO HROFF1", "ALL OTHERS GOTO HRCK4 - C", "GOTO PUHRCK4"

Variable: puhrck4 
Type: integer
Description: Check Item 4.
Values: "IF ENTRY OF 1 ,  D ,  R OR V IN HRFTPT THEN GOTO HRACT1", "IF ENTRY OF 2 ,  D OR R IN BUS2 THEN GOTO HROFF1", "IF HRUSLT IS 0 - 34 THEN GOTO HRWANT", "IF ENTRY OF 2 IN HRFTPT THEN GOTO HRWANT", "ALL OTHERS GOTO HRACT1"

Variable: puhrck5 
Type: integer
Description: Check Item 5.
Values: "IF ENTRY OF 1 IN MJOT GOTO HRACT2", "ALL OTHERS GOTO HRCK6 - C"

Variable: puhrck6 
Type: integer
Description: Check Item 6.
Values: "IF HRACT1 AND HRACT2 EQ 0 AND ENTRY OF 2 ,  D ,  R IN BUS2 THEN GOTO LK", "IF HRACT1 AND HRACT2 EQ 0 THEN STORE 1 IN ABSOT AND GOTO ABSRSN", "ALL OTHERS GOTO HRACTT - C"

Variable: puhrck7 
Type: integer
Description: Check Item 7.
Values: "IF ENTRY OF 1 IN HRWANT AND HRACTT  <  35 AND  ( ENTRY OF 1 ,  2 ,  3 IN HRRSN1 )  GOTO HRAVL", "ALL OTHERS GOTO HRCK8"

Variable: puhrck12 
Type: integer
Description: Check Item 12.
Values: "IF ENTRY OF 2 ,  D OR R IN BUS2 AND HRACTT IS LESS THAN 15 OR D GOTO LK", "ALL OTHERS GOTO IOCK1"

Variable: pulaydt 
Type: integer
Description: Has your employer given you a date to return to work?
Values: "YES", "NO"

Variable: pulay6m 
Type: integer
Description: Have you been given any indication that you will be recalled to work within the next 6 months?
Values: "YES", "NO"

Variable: pulayavr 
Type: integer
Description: Why is that?
Values: "OWN TEMPORARY ILLNESS", "GOING TO SCHOOL", "OTHER"

Variable: pulk 
Type: integer
Description: Have you been doing anything to find work during the last 4 weeks?
Values: "YES", "NO", "RETIRED", "DISABLED", "UNABLE TO WORK"

Variable: pulkavr 
Type: integer
Description: Why is that?
Values: "WAITING FOR NEW JOB TO BEGIN", "OWN TEMPORARY ILLNESS", "GOING TO SCHOOL", "OTHER  -  SPECIFY"

Variable: pulayck1 
Type: integer
Description: Check Item 1.
Values: "GOTO PULAYCK3", "GOTO PULAYFT", "GOTO PULAYDR"

Variable: pulayck2 
Type: integer
Description: Check Item 2 screen for dependent layoff.
Values: "GOTO PULAYDR3", "GOTO PULAYFT"

Variable: pulayck3 
Type: integer
Description: Check Item 3 filter for dependent I & O.
Values: "MISCK  =  5 GOTO IO1INT", "I - ICR  =  1 OR I - OCR  =  1 ,  GOTO IO1INT", "ALL OTHERS GOTO SCHCK"

Variable: pudwck1 
Type: integer
Description:

Variable: pudwck2 
Type: integer
Description: Screen for disabled

Variable: pudwck4

Variable: pujhck2 
Type: integer

Variable: pujhdp1o 
Type: integer
Description: Did you do any of this work in the last 4 weeks?
Values: "YES", "NO"

Variable: pujhck3 
Type: integer
Description: Job history check item.
Values: "IF I - MLR EQ 3 OR 4 THEN GOTO PUJHDP1", "ALL OTHERS GOTO PUJHRSN"

Variable: pujhck4 
Type: integer
Description: Screen for dependent NILF.
Values: "IF ENTRY OF 2 ,  D OR R IN PUDW4WK OR IN PUJHDP1O THEN GOTO PUJHCK5", "IF ENTRY OF 1 IN PUDW4WK OR IN PUJHDP10 THEN GOTO PUIO1INT", "IF I - MLR EQUALS 1 OR 2 AND ENTRY IN PUJHRSN THEN GOTO PUJHCK5", "IF ENTRY IN PUJHRSN THEN GOTO PUIO1INT", "ALL OTHERS GOTO PUNLFCK1"

Variable: pujhck5 
Type: integer
Description: Screen for dependent NILF.
Values: "IF I - IO1ICR EQUALS 1 OR I - IO1OCR EQUALS 1 THEN GOTO PUIO1INT", "ALL OTHERS GOTO PUIOCK5"
